poems.title: Binary Beats
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
Ones and zeros, marching tight,
A dance of logic, black and white,
Circuits hum where thoughts ignite,
Code the dawn, command the night.

poems.title: Bug Hunt
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
A semicolon lost in endless lines,
A missing bracket, oh what signs!
Debugging late by screen's dull glow,
The curse and joy all coders know.

poems.title: The Loop Eternal
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
While passion burns, the code will spin,
A loop without an end to win,
With breakpoints set and dreams in mind,
The answer waits for those who grind.

poems.title: Gaming Realms
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
Pixels dancing, worlds to roam,
Boss fights lurking, far from home,
Respawn ready, heart in chest,
Only those who fail the test.

poems.title: The Compiler's Wrath
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
You wrote with heart, the code was pure,
Syntax perfect, logic sure,
But compilers scoff, their errors cruel —
"Expected ';' — you broke the rule!"

poems.title: AI Awakens
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
Neural nets that learn and dream,
Training minds in lines unseen,
A future forged by coded art,
Machine and man — not far apart.

poems.title: Git Commit Regret
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
A tiny tweak, the deadline near,
"Git commit" — the coast was clear,
Next day the build begins to break —
A lesson learned: just double-check.

poems.title: Boss Fight: Final Level
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
Joystick shaking, health bar low,
Fingers racing, heartbeats slow,
One last strike — the boss defeated!
Controller dropped, the quest completed.

poems.title: Hello, World!
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
First line written, first dream sparked,
A coder’s journey proudly marked,
From print to apps, from loops to light,
A single line can change your life.

poems.title: Game Dev Dreams
poems.author: ChatGPT
poems.content:
From scratch to sprites, from code to play,
Worlds unfolding night and day,
Ideas pressed in digital streams,
A player’s joy — a dev's sweet dream.
